title: The Wife Test
description: Posing as a nun, Chloe of Guibray leaves the convent in which she was raised and journeys to England to discover her true heritage with four maidens who have been chosen as brides for King Edward's nobles - an adventure that leads her into the arms of Sir Hugh of Sennet, a maddening knight who lays seige to her heart. Original.
author: Betina Krahn
